attributes.action: ensure that Ed Balls does not approve the closure of St Aelred's Newton-le-Wilows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
St Aelred's Technology High School, in Newton-le-Willows is a fine school.

It has a good reputation and is one of the better performing schools in St Helens LEA.

However, there is a proposal to close it in order to create an Academy.  This is wrong!

An Academy should replace a long failing school, a good school should not be forced to close to give the justification to replace a smaller failing school with an Academy or to make such an Academy financially viable.

We ask the Prime Minister to intervene with Minister Balls to ensure that the school remains open.

This will mean that parents have an option to express choice and preference and allow a good school is to continue.
